oai_dc:dc.dc:title: M'CORMICK'S VIRGINIA REAPER AND MOWER, 1860
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sales flyer for M'Cormick's (McCormick's) Virginia Reaper and Mower and Sinclair's Straw -Cutter, sold by C. Powell & Co., Gay Street, Knoxville, Tenn. Beckett, Haws & Co., Prs. (printers), Knoxville. Local endorsements, all dated 1860.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Advertisements; Agricultural machinery & implements; Ephemera;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
